titles.title: Stop CCP Money Laundering Act of 2025
Stop CCP Money Laundering Act of 2025
Stop Corrupt Communist Party Money Laundering Act of 2025
A bill to require a determination and report relating to money laundering and violations of export controls and sanctions in Hong Kong.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
